definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: study, exposition, midrash, only cstr. [[מִדְרַשׁ]] (late; common in NH, in sense of imaginative exposition or didactic story)—[[מִדְרַשׁ סֵפֶר הַמְּלָכִים]] midrash of the book of Kings 2Ch 24:27; [[מִדְרַשׁ הַנׇּבִיא עִדּוֹ]] midrash of the prophet Iddo 2Ch 13:22. These were prob. of a didactic character, cf. Dr:Intr 497.
